roleHelp.title: ğŸ’™ Role help
roleHelp.description:
[PREFIX]set-role mod @role -- moderation/admin
[PREFIX]set-role poll @role -- create polls
**You have to mention the role!**
Only the specified role will have access (no hierarchy)

leaveMessageOff.title: ğŸ—¨ Leave Message
leaveMessageOff.description: Now I will **not** send leave messages when someone leaves!

leaveMessageEmpty.title: Empty
leaveMessageEmpty.description: Leave message can not be nothing, use "off" if you want to turn the feature off

welcomeMessageOff.title: ğŸ—¨ Welcome Message
welcomeMessageOff.description: Now I will **not** send welcome messages when someone leaves!

welcomeMessageEmpty.title: Empty
welcomeMessageEmpty.description: Welcome message can not be nothing, use "off" if you want to turn the feature off

welcomeChannelOff.title: ğŸ™‹â€â™‚ï¸ Welcome Channel
welcomeChannelOff.description: Welcome and leave messages will no longer appear!

noChannelMention.title: No channel
noChannelMention.description: You have to mention a channel, like: #channelname

notTextChannel.title: Not text channel
notTextChannel.description: You have to provide a valid **text** channel!

noReadSendPerm.title: No permission
noReadSendPerm.description: I don't have **read** or **send** permission for the channel!

reminderAlreadyExists.title: Already exists
reminderAlreadyExists.description: A reminder with this name is already exists!

invalidDate.title: Invalid date format
invalidDate.description: You have to provide a valid date, like: 2020.11.24-20:30

missingReminderMention.title: â€¼ Invalid mention
missingReminderMention.description: You have to mention a role/user/everyone!

notEnoughArguments.title: â€¼ Invalid
notEnoughArguments.description: There isn't enough arguments to operate with!

noUserPerm.title: âŒ No permission
noUserPerm.description: You don't have permission to use this command!

noVoiceChannelMatch.title: Ooops
noVoiceChannelMatch.description: You are not listening with the bot, you can't use this command now!

musicChannelOff.title: ğŸ”‰ Music Channel
musicChannelOff.description: Music channel restrictions are turned off!

nothingToPause.title: Ooops
nothingToPause.description: There isn't any music to pause!

noMusicToSkip.title: Ooops
noMusicToSkip.description: There is nothing playing that I could skip for you.

noMusicToStop.title: Ooops
noMusicToStop.description: There is nothing playing that I could stop for you.

notNumberVolume.title: ğŸ”Š Volume
notNumberVolume.description: You have to provide a valid number as the volume!

songNotFound.title: ğŸ” Not Found
songNotFound.description: We can't find any songs that matches this: [SONG]

songQueued.title: âœ… Queued
songQueued.description: **[SONG]** has been added to the queue!

cantJoinVoice.title: ğŸ˜“ Can't join
cantJoinVoice.description: I could not join the voice channel!

notInVoiceChannel.title: ğŸ”‰ Music
notInVoiceChannel.description: You have to be in a voice channel to play music!

noBotPermToJoinVoice.title: No permission
noBotPermToJoinVoice.description: I don't have permission to connect to your voice channel!

noBotPermToSpeak.title: No permission
noBotPermToSpeak.description: I don't have permission to speak in your voice channel!

songQueueEmpty.title: Empty!
songQueueEmpty.description: There isn't anything in the queue!
